description:
Here's another guy that I think is hotter than hell. Evan is one of those guys you see in the clubs... the one with the muscles and the tank top and the dark hair and the cute smile. The one you want to take home and lick from head to toe.
Evan has one of the nicest chests I've ever seen. It's big and muscular with just the right amount of hair and these large, incredibly sexy nipples. He works hard in the gym and it really shows.
He was real shy when I first met him but he warmed up pretty quickly... and he's really sweet too. But there are two things about him that pretty much say it all: he's into guys and he was a gymnast in college (grin).
title: Evan
